page.title: 06Entertainment - Littlebourne
page.content: Clubs,Entertainment + Recreation in the three villages centre around the vilage halls.{Littlebourne Hall }is the war memorial hall opened in 1955 + extended in 1963 to include a kitchen + stage. Regular uses include KCC Baby clinic, Playgroup, Youth Club, Cubs, Scouts, Women's Institute, Senior Citizens, Littlebourne Players, Badminton Club. It is also used for Whist Drives, Dances (Discos,Ballroom, Folk), Wedding receptions, jumble sales,bazaars + meetings. It is run by a Hall Committee elected every year. {Ickham}Village Hall is by the old school, was renovated about 5 years ago,new heating and stage. The clock has also been repaired. The Hall is used for Playgroup, Badminton, Keep fit as well as jumble sales etc. {Wickhambreux}Hall is used for School Meals, youth club, WI + flower shows.
